name: RetroFix AI
long_description: RetroFix is a web platform that allows contractors to automatically apply for tax incentives and sustainability credits. Currently, contractors rarely apply for credits because discovering incentives, checking eligibility, and applying are all done manually via emails and phone calls with local utilities and/or government offices. RetroFix consolidates information on government incentives and allows building managers/contractors to apply in minutes, saving hundreds of thousands of dollars per building.
